caption.p: Fourier transform infrared spectrophotometer (FTIR) spectra of the essential oils from five different Zanthoxylum species. The insertion is the inset evidence of the peaks between 500–4000 cm −1: ( ---) MK1, ( ---) MK2, ( ---) MK3, ( ---) HJ, and ( ---) MKO. Abbreviations; huajiao (HJ), makwoung (MKO), MK1 (makhwaen from Mae Tang district), MK2 (makhwaen from Mae Rim district), and MK3 (makhwaen from Song Kwae district).
